newsitem.title: INDIA: Coal India Apr96-Jan97 coal output 198.38 mln t.
newsitem.headline: Coal India Apr96-Jan97 coal output 198.38 mln t.

text.p: India's state-run Coal India Ltd produced 198.38 million tonnes coal between April 1996 and January 1997 against 185.18 million during the same period one year earlier, a government statement said on Thursday.

The statement said Singareni Collieries Company Ltd, a subsidiary of Coal India Ltd, produced 21.98 million tonnes of coal between April 1996 and January 1997 against 19.39 million tonnes during the same period a year earlier.
